activities.title: Sports & Activities
activities.description: My journey through athletics, creative pursuits, and personal interests that shape who I am beyond academics

athletic.title: Athletic Pursuits
athletic.description: Sports have been a constant source of motivation, teaching me about dedication, teamwork, and pushing beyond limits.

items.description: My maintenance sport. Practicing in a gym and outdoors in order to stay in shape and aim for long-term health and strength. Taught me discipline and consistency.

items.level: Certified Lifeguard and First Help Team Rescuer
items.description: Swimming was a late discovery for me, but I quickly fell in love with the sport. It has taught me patience, perseverance, and the importance of technique. Becoming a certified lifeguard added a layer of responsibility and community service to my swimming practice.
achievements: Certified First Help Team Rescuer (PSE1 & PSE2)
items.impact: Lifeguarding has enhanced my sense of responsibility and ability to stay calm under pressure. It has also improved my communication skills and ability to work as part of a team.

items.description: Combat sports have taught me discipline, respect, and the importance of mental fortitude. The number of technics to learn and the physical demands push me to constantly improve and stay curious.
items.impact: Combat sports have enhanced my mental toughness and ability to stay calm under pressure, skills that are invaluable in high-stress situations.

items.title: "Homelabing"
items.description: Staying curious about emerging technologies beyond my academic curriculum. Enhancing comfort by automating services, self-hosting, and implementing IoT automation at home.
items.connection: Hands-on experimentation reinforces theoretical knowledge and sparks innovation in my engineering studies.

items.title: Hiking & Nature
items.description: Regular hiking trips to disconnect, recharge, and appreciate nature's engineering marvels.
highlights: Explored mountain trails in 3 different countries
items.connection: Nature inspires sustainable thinking and provides perspective on the elegance of natural systems vs. human-engineered ones.

items.title: Reading
items.description: Avid reader across genres to fuel imagination and continuous learning. Provides a way to unwind and gain new perspectives.
items.connection: Reading broadens my horizons, fuels creativity, and provides insights that enhance personal growth.

education.title: Education & Mentoring
education.intro: Mentoring and educational initiatives to support students in their academic journeys drives me alot. Through my personnal experiences, from economics to the health sector and then IT, I understand the challenges students face when making educational and career choices. I am passionate about sharing my knowledge and experiences to help others navigate their paths more confidently. I feel I lacked so much guidance when I was younger, and I want to be that guide for others in need.

items.title: Article1 - Mentorat vers le Sup'
items.description: Mentor high school students interested in pursuing higher education, providing guidance on academic choices and career paths. A matching program is organized by the association in order to pair students with mentors in their field of interest. Long-term mentorship relationships are encouraged to provide ongoing support.
activities: Provide advices on study techniques and time management
items.reflection: Mentoring has been incredibly rewarding, allowing me to give back and help others navigate their educational journeys. It has also improved my communication skills and ability to explain complex topics simply as well as sharing my passion for learning. The matching was excellent and I really enjoyed our conversations.

items.title: Ing√©Sup
items.target: "BTS" Students (equivalent to HND with a work-ready training focus)
items.description: Assist BTS students in their transition to engineering school by sharing insights on academic expectations, study techniques, and time management. This initiative is organized by the association Ing√©Sup, which aims to support students in their journey towards higher education.
items.reflection: Less tailored approach than high school mentoring, I felt less impactful. However, it was still a valuable experience that helped me refine my mentoring skills and reinforced my own understanding of the engineering school journey.

Implementing snapshot and compliance solutions for critical network infrastructure

items.company: Urban Community of Grand Albigeois (80k citizens)
items.description: Specialized internship focused on automation development and cybersecurity.
achievements: Contributed to help and mitigate the impact of a cyber-attack, with proactive hardening, cooperating with national authorities (CERT-FR, ANSSI), coordinating the actions of international tech support, onfield operator, and executive management.

Built a middleware in Python and NodeJS as to enhance VMS capabilities (REST API) in order to centralise alerts coming from legacy sensors (MQTT), helping non-technical people to implement ad-hoc sites and sensors through a web GUI (PostgreSQL, Node-RED dashboards).
Study of the architecture of an API for physical access control and design of a Proof of Concept for LDAP implementation.

items.description: Monitored pool activities, ensured safety protocols, and provided assistance to guests.

Teamplaying skills were put to test as to help, advise, and warn customers for their safety.

items.description: "Drive through" employee. The main part of the work consisted of shopping for the clients, loading groceries in their trunks, and advising customers inside the store.

projects.title: Project Portfolio
projects.description: Explore detailed case studies of my technical projects, complete with challenges, solutions, and visual documentation

items.title: NetProbe - A network monitoring web application
items.description: A full-stack web application for automated network deployment, monitoring, using modern network protocols and containerized environments. Leveraging gNMI streaming telemtry and containerlab to create ad-hoc topologies and monitor its status.
items.challenge: Creating a user-friendly interface for network engineers to deploy and monitor complex network topologies without deep knowledge of underlying protocols and tools.
items.solution: Developed a Vue.js frontend with a Node.js backend that interfaces with containerlab for topology deployment and gNMI for real-time telemetry. Implemented features like real-time status updates, alerting, and live topology overview.
items.learnings: Gained hands-on experience with modern network protocols and full-stack web development. Improved skills in asynchronous programming and real-time data handling.

items.title: Sustainable Homelab Automation & Self-Hosting
items.description: Designing and implementing a home lab environment for self-hosting services and automating home IoT devices. Focused on network architecture, containerization, and home automation using Home Assistant.

gallery.caption: Picture of my old infrastructure making use of refurbished enterprise hardware. [To be changed]

items.title: Graph-coursup - Implementing an admission algorithm using graph theory
items.description: Implemented a stable matching algorithm for the French higher education admission system (Parcoursup) using graph theory concepts in Python. A rework is in progress to integrate a web interface and visualizations using graph database Neo4J and a python web framework (Django or FastAPI).
